General.Name: EMEK Elektrik Endustrisi AS
General.Description: Emek Elektrik Endustrisi Anonim Sirketi engages in the production, testing, marketing, and sale of transformers, capacitors, disconnectors, and electromechanical equipment in Turkey. It offers oil immersed and epoxy resin current and voltage transformers, disconnectors with and without earthing switch, insulators, components, grading and coupling capacitors, and 1 and 3 phase earthing switches. The company also exports its products to 118 countries. Emek Elektrik Endustrisi Anonim Sirketi was incorporated in 1969 and is based in Ankara, Turkey.
General.Address: Saracalar Mahallesi Özal Bulvari, Ankara, Turkey, 06750
